content:
Based on the execution logs, here is the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-18, -53)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18, -53) dropping to wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5) moving items to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-15, -51)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5) moving items to storage
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) dropping to wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving items to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-25, -59)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5) moving items to storage
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Coal Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41, -82) dropping to wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)
- Storage chest containing coal

### Power Generation Complex at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected via pipe networks for water and steam
- Multiple electricity poles forming grid (ID 7410)

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5) crafting automation science packs
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5) for iron gear wheels
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserters at (6.5, 13.5) and (10.5, 13.5) for input/output
- Connected belt groups for material transport
- Lab researching logistics technology

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Ensure target storage chest contains the requested item before attempting extraction
- Verify storage chest positions when attempting to extract items

### Production Issues
- Maintain adequate fuel (coal) levels in burner devices
- Keep input materials stocked in assembling machines to prevent ingredient shortages
- Monitor copper plate production and supply chain to prevent automation science pack production stoppages

### Inventory Management
- Keep coal in inventory for fueling burner devices
- Maintain balanced supply of copper plates and iron gear wheels for science pack production
